tests.conftest module

Configuration for test

This module shows the configuration done before you run a test

test database url

Type:

str

tests.conftest.app() → Generator[FastAPI, Any, None][source]

Create a fresh database on each test case.

tests.conftest.client(app: ~fastapi.applications.FastAPI, db_session: sessionmaker(class_='Session', autocommit=False, bind=Engine(sqlite:///./testing_db.db), autoflush=False, expire_on_commit=True)) → Generator[TestClient, Any, None][source]

Create a new FastAPI TestClient that uses the db_session fixture to override the get_db dependency that is injected into routes.
